text: The British Museum, in Bloomsbury, London, the world's oldest public national museum, opened to the public. Entry was free and given to 'all studious and curious Persons'.
Wikipedia, the free Wiki content encyclopedia, went online as a feeder project for Nupedia, an expert-written online encyclopedia.
Thanks to a solar flare, ESA's SMART-1 lunar orbiter discovered calcium, aluminium, silicon and iron - in Mare Crisium on the moon.
Facebook announced its 'Graph Search' improvements to internal search and recommendations.
